1554.name: SP WC8812Ni
1554.Applications: carbide powder for wear resistant coatings produced by flame-, plasma or hig hvelocity- flame-spraying (HVOF). Tungsten-Carbide-Nickel-coatings are resistant to abrasion and oxidation. In comparison with WC-Co layers they show an improved corrosion resistance in aqueous solutions. Plasma sprayed coatings can achieve a hardness of up to 1000 HV0.1 and tensile strength acc. to DIN 50160 of 60 N/mm². The maximum operating temperature is 750°C.
1554.Suitable_For: Augers, impellors, shafts, hydraulics, pulling equipment, fan blades etc.
